summary: The Los Angeles Lakers are a famous basketball team in the NBA. They've won 17 championships, second only to the Boston Celtics. The team started in Detroit in 1946 and moved to Minneapolis, winning titles in the NBL and BAA before joining the NBA. They moved to LA in 1960 and had a famous rivalry with the Celtics. Stars like Wilt Chamberlain, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Magic Johnson, and Kobe Bryant led the Lakers to many victories. The Lakers hold the record for the longest NBA winning streak. They last won a championship in 2020, tying the Celtics for the most titles.
title: Los Angeles Lakers
